title: Ep 115: Skincare Rituals with Brooke DeVard Ozaydinli
itunes:title: Ep 115: Skincare Rituals with Brooke DeVard Ozaydinli
itunes:subtitle: This week, Kate successfully makes sourdough bread and Doree makes a plan to keep from feeling overwhelmed at the end of every day. Then they’re joined by Brooke DeVard Ozaydinli, host of the Naked Beauty Podcast. She shares how to make DIY skincare pr...
description:
This week, Kate successfully makes sourdough bread and Doree makes a plan to keep from feeling overwhelmed at the end of every day. Then they’re joined by Brooke DeVard Ozaydinli, host of the Naked Beauty Podcast. She shares how to make DIY skincare products at home, why lighting a candle is key to her nighttime routine, and why she can’t stop raving about sea buckthorn oil.


To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

HYDRANT - For 25% off your first order, go to DrinkHydrant.com and enter promo code forever35 at checkout.

BEST FIENDS - Download Best Fiends FREE on the Apple App Store or Google Play. That’s FRIENDS without the R – Best Fiends.

SIGNATURE HARDWARE - Real-life isn’t always perfect, but with Signature Hardware it is beautiful. Visit signaturehardware.com/FOREVER35 to find your style today.

MASTERCLASS - Visit masterclass.com/forever35 for 15% off the Annual All-Access Pass.

YOGASLEEP - Go to Yogasleep.com/FOREVER35 to save an exclusive 20% off a sound machine for natural sleep. 

LEAN OUT - You can purchase Lean Out by Tara Henley from your favorite audiobook retailer or visit penguinrandomhouse.ca to learn more!


Theme music by Riot.



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
